pullrequest.title: Teleop of a team of Jackal, Husky, and Iris (in a dark lava tube)

content.raw:
Apparently, xacro's macro accepts an empty block parameter but still needs an empty block like `<params></params>`. I updated the xacro files as the default settings \(constant white light\) are overwritten when the block parameter has some values.

[#!/osrf/subt/commits/99014ea426db8d183a4b162305873edff6686e61?at=default](#!/osrf/subt/commits/99014ea426db8d183a4b162305873edff6686e61?at=default)
content.html:
Apparently, xacro's macro accepts an empty block parameter but still needs an empty block like <params></params>. I updated the xacro files as the default settings (constant white light) are overwritten when the block parameter has some values.

#!/osrf/subt/commits/99014ea426db8d183a4b162305873edff6686e61?at=default
